title: WATCH & VOTE: Wayne Rooney's best Premier League goal?
description: With Wayne Rooney appearing on Monday Night Football, we are asking you to vote on his best Premier League goal.
content:
England's all-time leading scorer will be joining Jamie Carragher on MNF from 7pm on Sky Sports ahead of Watford v Chelsea.
Rooney has scored 208 Premier League goals, but which is his best?
Was it his strike against Arsenal back in 2002? Or maybe his bicycle kick against Manchester City in 2011?
We have picked out our top five, which you can watch in the video at the top of the page, and you can vote for your favourite below…
